response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer that reflects its true value. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a price of $750,000. This offer not only ensures you secure an exceptional deal but also allows you to benefit from a significant discount. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction for you.", "product_price": 750000}
